= About Evil Cult =

Evil Cult is copyright 2009,2010 [http://www.starinfidel.co.cc StarInfidel] and Phil Bordelon.  It is released under the GNU GPL v3; further details, including source, are available at:

  http://code.google.com/p/cult

The project is written using the [http://haxe.org Haxe] language and compiled into Javascript. The music you hear in-game is from the [http://kahvi.org Kahvi Collective] netlabel.  The tracks are as follows:
 * [http://www.kahvi.org/artist_info.php?nickname=Introspective Introspective] - [http://www.kahvi.org/releases.php?release_number=051 Occlusion]
 * [http://www.kahvi.org/artist_info.php?nickname=Introspective Introspective] - [http://www.kahvi.org/releases.php?release_number=080 Analogy]
 * [http://www.kahvi.org/artist_info.php?nickname=Introspective Introspective] - [http://www.kahvi.org/releases.php?release_number=236 Black Mesa Winds]
 * [http://www.kahvi.org/artist_info.php?nickname=Introspective Introspective] - [http://www.kahvi.org/releases.php?release_number=176 Gewesen]
 * [http://www.kahvi.org/artist_info.php?nickname=Curious%20Inversions Curious Inversions] - [http://www.kahvi.org/releases.php?release_number=254 Whom]
